name: bpl-commander
description: BPL Commander - Comprehensive Project Management Application

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" --prefix "[{name}]" --names "backend,frontend" "cd backend && yarn dev" "cd frontend && yarn dev"
scripts.build: cd backend && yarn build && cd ../frontend && yarn build
scripts.test: cd backend && yarn test && cd ../frontend && yarn test
